
An intern reused a prime when generating RSA keys for secret messages. Can you exploit this and recover the flag from the ciphertext: 52665018909368002157713477656652708877855220935208425780029997668611002122142146557644361455713612149079193669010657783508054413836749858243962532824228649871052235040462636811359774420017521576682645986212888383827666919238534450?


The flag format is flag{...}
n=705746178029048852819148746791160825688559680369794759541783508826628092507837718846126736962444483818665186442368710858555471470389198037875077484947324933359721620786961084642112032864223594217570219902534089973299636609683311849, e=639661497879187472587509137927419279310280132967516863608804025223939933597889590457039334287016056971679568799387473437892253693087483582907674190834555286521837067446650662828976448754454588067305955354158494443912278352981860741

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{6p999dwh}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 52665018909368002157713477656652708877855220935208425780029997668611002122142146557644361455713612149079193669010657783508054413836749858243962532824228649871052235040462636811359774420017521576682645986212888383827666919238534450
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=705746178029048852819148746791160825688559680369794759541783508826628092507837718846126736962444483818665186442368710858555471470389198037875077484947324933359721620786961084642112032864223594217570219902534089973299636609683311849, e=639661497879187472587509137927419279310280132967516863608804025223939933597889590457039334287016056971679568799387473437892253693087483582907674190834555286521837067446650662828976448754454588067305955354158494443912278352981860741
extra_info: p=26565883723848692115037540256816434839886239168511086204694456491962242457650091876294325042259330814669719188741293, q=26565883723848692115037540256816434839886239168511086204694456491962242457650091876294325042259330814669719188741293, Ï†(n)=705746178029048852819148746791160825688559680369794759541783508826628092507837718846126736962444483818665186442368657726788023773004967962794563852077645160881384598614551695729128108379308294033817631252449571311670297171305829264
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
